article.div: (Video) Orange Unified's COVID-19 Response Efforts | Esfuerzos de respuesta COVID-19 de Orange Unified

div.p: Schools are an essential service and crucial to our communities. We take the honor and duty of educating our students very seriously and appreciate the efforts of our teachers, parents, and students to adapt to new ways to teach and learn during these challenging times.

We are fully aware of the disruptions school closures cause, and we are continuously working to support the needs of our students and families during the COVID-19 pandemic. Check out how: https://youtu.be/YWNAFpoak0I

Las escuelas son un servicio esencial y crucial para nuestras comunidades. Nos tomamos el honor y el deber de educar a nuestros estudiantes muy en serio y apreciamos los esfuerzos de nuestros maestros, padres y estudiantes para adaptarse a nuevas formas de enseñar y aprender durante estos tiempos difíciles.

Somos plenamente conscientes de las interrupciones que causan los cierres de escuelas, y estamos trabajando continuamente para apoyar las necesidades de nuestros estudiantes y familias durante la pandemia de COVID-19. Mira cómo: https://youtu.be/YWNAFpoak0I

The Orange Unified School District educates approximately 28,000 K-12 grade students in the Cities of Orange, Villa Park, Anaheim, Garden Grove, Santa Ana, and unincorporated county areas. In partnership with our community, we provide a safe, equitable, and innovative culture of learning for each scholar to have a competitive EDGE as a leader.
